Key Match Events: Luis Severino gave up just one run over seven innings in a 4-1 win over the Red Sox
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets looked to continue a critical six-game homestand
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets reached a season-high 10 games over.500 (74-64) with Mondayâ€™s win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory came in front of a home crowd of 35,149, their highest attendance without a fan giveaway since they hosted the Yankees in the Subway Series on June 26
Others: Francisco Lindor, competing with the Dodgers Shohei Ohtani in the NL MVP race, reached base three times, scored a run and drove in another
